name: Ocean Spray® Oatmeal Cranberry White Chocolate Chunk Cookies
author: Anonymous
summary: Craisins® dried cranberries are a wonderful addition to oatmeal cookies baked with yummy white chocolate chips.
ingredients: ⅔ cup butter or margarine, softened
1 (6 ounce) package Ocean Spray® Craisins® Original Dried Cranberries
⅔ cup white chocolate chunks or chips
directions: Using an electric mixer, beat butter or margarine and sugar together in a medium mixing bowl until light and fluffy
Combine oats, flour, baking soda and salt in a separate mixing bowl
Add to butter mixture in several additions, mixing well after each addition
Stir in dried cranberries and white chocolate chunks
Drop by rounded teaspoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets
Bake for 10-12 minutes or until golden brown
